why_this_matters: Sales funnels work like audio mixing - each stage requires specific frequency tuning to create harmonic progression toward conversion
scrape_method: Sales conversion data + acoustic psychology + marketing automation + frequency therapy research
raw_data_snippet: Awareness: 528Hz content (healing frequency), Interest: 432Hz messaging (natural tuning), Decision: 741Hz copy (problem solving), Action: 963Hz CTA (completion)
replication_instruction: Tune marketing content to specific frequencies, match message resonance to funnel stage, use harmonic progression in email sequences, synchronize CTA frequency with decision state
